PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-11762015-07-31,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD PART VI (OIL AND GAS) REGULATIONS in order to define ‘natural gas’ to support the development of Canadian liquefied natural gas (LNG) export facilities by providing LNG exporters with some degree of flexibility in the composition of natural gas to be exported under 40-year licences, but not to allow exporters to export natural gas with a high concentration of natural gas liquids under 40-year licences.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0212 Publication Date: 2015-08-12
AttachmentsAttachment
